meanings.definition: The action or process of interlocking or intertwining closely.
meanings.sent1: The interdigitation of the gears allowed the machine to run smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The interdigitation of the tree roots created a strong network underground.
meanings.sent3: The interdigitation of the spaghetti strands made it challenging to separate them.
meanings.sent4: The interdigitation of the puzzle pieces symbolized the complexity of solving the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The interdigitation of the vines in the jungle formed a dense canopy above.

meanings.definition: The state of being interlocked or intertwined closely.
meanings.sent1: The interdigitation of the branches created a natural shelter for the birds.
meanings.sent2: The interdigitation of the threads in the fabric made it durable.
meanings.sent3: The interdigitation of the dancers' movements mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent4: The interdigitation of thoughts in his mind led to a brilliant idea.
meanings.sent5: The interdigitation of the spider's web glistened in the sunlight.
